mainDescription.subtitle: FRONTEND WEB DEVELOPER
mainDescription.name: Hello, I'm Antonio Delage, contact me to create
mainDescription.title: Your web application with best technologies.

item1.description1: Development of web applications for BBVA bank. In this project I used litElement, JavaScript and CELLS to develop high quality and scalable UI components, participating in testing and debugging issues to ensure the quality of the final product. My experience in litElement and JavaScript has allowed me to acquire solid skills in creating reusable web components and developing dynamic interactions and impressive visual effects in the interface

item2.description1: - Created 2 pages for HSBC UK Bank using ReactJs. I improved the user experience by implementing React Query, Redux and React Router, resulting in a more intuitive and user-friendly user interface. In addition, I used Sass and HTML to improve the look and feel of the pages. The SCRUM methodology and the use of Git allowed me to work efficiently and deliver consistent results.
item2.description2: - In terms of performance, implementing React Query resulted in a 40% increase in data load speed and implementing Redux improved data consistency by 30%. The use of React Router also improved navigation by 20%. Overall, these improvements contributed to a more satisfying user experience and higher overall performance.

item3.description1: - In my first ReactJS project, I worked on the development of an application using React Hooks, Leaflet, HTML, CSS and Git, following a Kanban methodology. It was an enriching experience that allowed me to improve my skills in application development with ReactJS and in the use of interactive maps with Leaflet.

item4.description1: - These months I had the opportunity to work on solving tickets related to the functionality of the application. This included both new feature development and bug fixing tasks.
item4.description2: - In addition to working with VanillaJS, I also used HTML and CSS to create the user interface and ensure visual consistency in the application. On the other hand, I used Git to keep version control and collaborate with other team members on development.
item4.description3: - This experience allowed me to improve my skills in developing applications with VanillaJS and how to integrate different technologies such as HTML, CSS and Git to create a complete and effective application. In addition, I learned how to work in a team and solve problems efficiently.

about.title: About me
about.item1: - Professional web application development specialized in the frontend with the React JS library.
about.item2: - Currently I am working on the development of web applications with React JS and Node JS.
about.item3: - Other technologies I'm looking forward to learn are TypeScript, GraphQL and MongoDB. I would also like to learn how to use the React Native library for mobile app development.
